China Developer Broadens Its Reach

Eliot Brown and Esther Fung Aug 6, 2014

Forest City Ratner Cos.' giant, 6,400-unit development near the new Barclays Center in Brooklyn has faced delays for over a decade. Enter China's Greenland Holding Group, which has different plans: finish the 15-tower project in less than 10 years. Forest City has only one tower under way and had been planning to take nearly two decades to complete the remaining buildings.
